flawed_nl_solution:
Each person brought 5 bags * 50 pounds per bag = <<5*50=250>>250 pounds per person.
There are 6 people * 250 pounds per person = <<6*250=150>>150 pounds of luggage on the plane.
The plan can hold 6000 pounds - 150 pounds = <<6000-150=5850>>5850 pounds of luggage space left.
The plane can hold an additional 5850 pounds / 50 pounds per bag = <<5850/50=117>>117 pieces of luggage.
#### 117

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1500, not 150. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
